(row = 6, col = 5)

Given that my avatar's position has not changed from the last state, I need to take a different action.

Currently, I am at (6, 5). There are enemy satellites (represented by 'f') nearby, and I should consider strategies to eliminate them. However, I also see several resources around, including portal ammo ('%') at (6, 30) and possible access to sections with enemy sprites.

Since my avatar hasn't moved, the most effective action now would be to shoot at the nearby enemies to gain a tactical advantage.

I will attempt to move towards a strategic position or direction. I will choose to move up to attack the enemy satellites and navigate the space more effectively.

``` Action:5 ``` 

This action is intended to position myself better for the next turn, ideally allowing better shots at the 'f' satellites on the next move or gathering resources effectively. I expect to see either an enemy eliminated or closer positioning to launch an attack.
